00040 class UniqueTime {
00041 private:
00042      static int smNextId;   
00043      int        mId;        
00044      Time       mTime;      
00045 
00046 public:
00052      UniqueTime(const Time &t) : mId(smNextId++), mTime(t) {}
00053 
00059      UniqueTime(const UniqueTime &t) : mId(t.mId), mTime(t.mTime) {}
00060 
00066      Time time() const { return mTime; }
00067 
00075      bool operator < (const UniqueTime &t) const { return (mTime < t.mTime ||
00076                                                                    mTime == t.mTime && mId < t.mId); }
00077 };

00087 class EngineStatusObject {
00088 private:
00090      std::vector<Error> mErrors;
00091 
00092 public:
00096      EngineStatusObject() {}
00097 
00103      EngineStatusObject(const Error& e) { mErrors.push_back(e); }
00104 
00110      EngineStatusObject(const std::vector<Error>& e) : mErrors(e) {}
00111 
00117      EngineStatusObject(const EngineStatusObject& e) : mErrors(e.mErrors) {}
00118 
00124      bool errorOccurred() const { return (!mErrors.empty()); }
00125 
00131      std::vector<Error> errors() const { return mErrors; }
00132 
00138      EngineStatusObject& operator = (const EngineStatusObject& e) { mErrors = e.mErrors; return *this; }
00139 };
